lines:
ve are

Mars.

Arhburnham

Address -

Il Central House 
ep Tur. C. S. Haung,

we have to pay our board, 
tutoring and lodging and 
other Kings & necessity..

as we are going to our 
Conference his apar, which will 
be held in Hamilten 14. Y.; each 
og mo wishes to have another 
hundred dollars for the seats 
the summer. 1

Wee entend to start for 
Hamilton this Saturday, if leve 
can we shall bet greatly 
obliged to you, if you can parte 
no with an immediate anstren, 
with best regardo.

is respectfully,

atuse 
3.c. Luke.

Faguen sen , 
o 3.5, kwani

Y.; each og mo wishes to have another hundred dollars for the seats the summer. 1 Wee entend to start for Hamilton this Saturday, if leve can we shall bet greatly obliged to you, if you can parte no with an immediate anstren, with best regardo. is respectfully, atuse 3.c. metadata.note_statement-responsibility: S.C. Luke, Fayuen Sun, S.S. Kwan
metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter stating that they have been in Ashburnham, MA for three weeks. They are enjoying their vacation, and are also studying with a tutor for a few hours a day. They request $100 for lodging, tutoring, food, and expenses for the conference in Hamilton, NY which begins soon.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
